text: Robert George "Bob" Uecker ( ; January 26, 1934 - January 16, 2025) was an American Major League Baseball player, later a sportscaster, comedian and actor. Uecker was also known as "Mr. Baseball". He was a play-by-play announcer for Milwaukee Brewers radio broadcasts. Uecker was a member of the National Baseball Hall of Fame as a 2003 recipient of the Ford C. Frick Award for his broadcasting career. Uecker was diagnosed with small-cell lung cancer in 2023.
